dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.time.CalendarAlarm
dataStructure.description:
Is "a reminder or alarm for an event or a to-do. For example, it may be used to define a reminder for a pending event or an overdue to-do." [iCalendar]

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CalendarAlarm

child.name: interval
child.description:
the interval between alarm repetitions

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: interval

child.name: repeatCount
child.description:
"the number of time the alarm should be repeated, after the initial trigger" [iCalendar]

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: repeatCount

child.name: alarmAction
child.description:
"the action to be invoked when an alarm is triggered" [iCalendar]

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: alarmAction

child.name: calendarActionEntry
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CalendarAlarmToCalendarActionEntry

This association end is optional
child.label: calendarActionEntry
